title: "Is ‘Femtech’ the Next Big Thing in Health Care?"
excerpt: "Start-ups and tech companies are creating products to address women’s health care needs. It’s still a small segment ... MobileODT, a start-up based in Tel Aviv, uses smartphones and artificial intelligence to screen for cervical cancer."
